summary: Resolved conflict in .claude-output.json. The conflict was a UD (Updated by us, Deleted by them) case: origin/main deleted this branch-specific output metadata file, but our feature branch legitimately owns it. Kept our version.
strategyUsed: chose ours â€” .claude-output.json is branch-specific PR output metadata generated by the feature branch; origin/main's deletion is not authoritative for this file in the context of the feature branch
